query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS unread_message_counts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  userType VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  threadId INT NOT NULL,
  unreadCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  lastReadMessageId INT,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aYsLc9eZnrL9DEu.43c395b54aa0 --database 2Awpr243D2Jitpj6Cn66Rx --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS unread_message_counts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  userType VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  threadId INT NOT NULL,
  unreadCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  lastReadMessageId INT,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
